rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员发现导致左心发育不全综合征的新基因通过识别患者体内的基因并测试其对果蝇的影响，桑福德伯纳姆普雷比学院的研究人员发现了导致左心发育不全综合征 (HLHS) 的新基因，这是一种罕见的、危及生命的心脏病，发生在婴儿身上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-find-new-genes-that-c​​ontribute-to-hypoplasty-left-heart-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-find-new-genes-that-c​​ontribute-to-hypoplasty-left-heart-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdc82e05-61c1-4cdb-9a2c-fdff5c7c08cb Mon, 17 Jul 2023 22:58:23 -0400 Researchers find new genes that contribute to hypoplastic left heart syndrome
影响与酒精使用障碍相关的疼痛感知的基因根据美国国立酒精滥用和酒精中毒研究所 (NIAAA) 的数据，估计美国有 1600 万人患有酒精使用障碍 (AUD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Genes-that-influence-pain-perception-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Genes-that-influence-pain-perception-linked-to-alcohol-use-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=426f262f-ac1e-4872-a921-969125695a6c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 22:56:42 -0400 Genes that influence pain perception linked to alcohol use disorders
研究建立了泌尿生殖道基因组不稳定性与细菌蛋白之间的新联系马里兰大学马里兰学院 (UMSOM) 人类病毒学研究所 (IHV)（全球病毒网络 (GVN) 卓越中心）的一组研究人员发表了新发现，强调泌尿道和生殖道的关键作用微生物群对不良妊娠结局和胎儿发育过程中起源于子宫的基因组不稳定的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-builtes-new-link- Between-genomic-instability-and-bacterial- Protein-in-the-urogenital-tract.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-builtes-new-link- Between-genomic-instability-and-bacterial- Protein-in-the-urogenital-tract.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7016af83-98fa-4ef0-b467-c93a289e4737 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 22:44:38 -0400 Study establishes new link between genomic instability and bacterial protein in the urogenital tract
研究揭示病毒如何超越宿主细胞的DNA复制机制匹兹堡大学的研究人员首次展示了默克尔细胞多瘤病毒 (MCV) 如何在宿主细胞中启动 DNA 复制，这种病毒会导致一种名为默克尔细胞癌的侵袭性皮肤癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-sheds-light-on-how-viruses-override-host-cells-DNA-replication-machinery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-sheds-light-on-how-viruses-override-host-cells-DNA-replication-machinery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e09663f2-c6d1-4650-a3ea-15b05c6729ab Mon, 17 Jul 2023 22:32:36 -0400 Study sheds light on how viruses override host cell's DNA replication machinery
AI模型准确预测哪些药物可能导致出生缺陷纽约西奈山伊坎医学院的数据科学家和同事创建了一个人工智能模型，可以更准确地预测哪些现有药物（目前未被归类为有害药物）实际上可能会导致先天性残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/AI-model-accurately-predicts-which-drugs-may-cause-birth-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/AI-model-accurately-predicts-which-drugs-may-cause-birth-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c04e667-997e-47ee-a986-c97343bc703e Mon, 17 Jul 2023 21:46:49 -0400 AI model accurately predicts which drugs may cause birth defects
研究揭示了患有罕见神经发育疾病的儿童之间的遗传差异西奈山西弗自闭症研究与治疗中心领导的新研究阐明了患有罕见神经发育疾病的儿童之间的遗传差异，并可能为护理这些儿童的精准医学方法指明道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-shines-light-on-genic-differences-among-children-with-rare-neurodevelopmental-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Study-shines-light-on-genic-differences-among-children-with-rare-neurodevelopmental-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e1f89a8-3bce-445d-affd-c993b59f7a36 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 21:42:48 -0400 Study shines light on genetic differences among children with rare neurodevelopmental condition
研究表明红线对黑人成年人心血管健康的长期影响根据美国心脏协会旗舰期刊《循环》今天发表的研究，居住在历史上受红线影响的美国邮政编码地区的黑人成年人，如今患心力衰竭的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-redlineds-long-term-impact-on-cardioangio-health-of-Black-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-redlineds-long-term-impact-on-cardioangio-health-of-Black-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff40842b-5e33-4e05-b4fc-d7ab242d030d Mon, 17 Jul 2023 21:33:02 -0400 Research shows redlining's long-term impact on cardiovascular health of Black adults
植入 ICD 的黑人患者植入后心脏事件发生率和死亡风险较高罗切斯特大学医学中心 (URMC) 心脏病学研究人员的一项新研究表明，使用植入式心律转复除颤器 (ICD) 的黑人患者的疾病负担明显高于使用相同设备的白人患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Black-病人-with-ICDs-have-higher-rate-of-post-implant-cardiac-events-and-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Black-病人-with-ICDs-have-higher-rate-of-post-implant-cardiac-events-and-risk-of-death.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c45c74d-2abe-423a-bfe3-7d709b9eeefd Mon, 17 Jul 2023 15:12:00 -0400 Black patients with ICDs have higher rate of post-implant cardiac events and risk of death
DNA折纸可用于制造定制的病毒样颗粒生物工程师已经找到了一种方法，通过结合病毒蛋白构建块和 DNA 制成的模板来编程病毒颗粒的大小和形状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/DNA-origami-could-be-used-to-create-customized-virus-like-articles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/DNA-origami-could-be-used-to-create-customized-virus-like-articles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f83958a-5150-462a-a0b1-9a69ddab2848 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 15:06:59 -0400 DNA origami could be used to create customized virus-like particles
婴儿拥有对抗新病原体的“秘密武器”哥伦比亚大学研究人员领导的两项新研究解释了为什么婴儿会出现如此多常见的呼吸道感染，并确定了仅在婴儿中发现的特殊免疫细胞群，可以帮助他们更好地应对新病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Babies-have-a-secret-weapon-that-helps-to-fight-new-pathogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Babies-have-a-secret-weapon-that-helps-to-fight-new-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27775487-6c2f-419e-bd84-47cb3cad8f6f Mon, 17 Jul 2023 15:02:07 -0400 Babies have a 'secret weapon' that helps to fight new pathogens
